app.name: FCE Ultra RX
app.long_description: Featuring: - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. - Sharp and soft filters. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES) - Wiiflow plugin mode. - Screenshot button. - New palettes: Smooth / PVM Style D93 / Composite NTSC NES Classic / Wii Virtual Console / PlayChoice-10 /PAL Sony CXA2025AS / NESCAP / HYBRID / Wavebeam / VS. System
